notes: Placeholder catalog for llava.cpp/Moondream managed vision bundles. Populate artifact coordinates once the signing pipeline lands.

bundles.name: llava.cpp Preview (Linux x86_64 GPU)
bundles.description: Vision-language llava.cpp build packaged for the managed runtime supervisor with consent-first capture flows.

artifacts.notes: Release tooling will inject URL + checksum once binaries are staged.

notes: Ships llava.cpp with vision inference support; generation backends (Stable Diffusion, etc.) will use the same catalog once licensed.
Supervisor exposes captions/transcript hooks so Launcher can surface accessible describe results.

support.driver_notes: Preview build targets NVIDIA GPUs; ROCm/Metal variants will be added in follow-up revisions.

consent.note: Camera capture requires the launcher consent overlay before streaming frames.
